message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I believe it's worth a significant amount of money, and I'm willing to part with it for a price of $1800000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but my budget for this product is capped at $800000. I would like to make a counteroffer at this price.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $800000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $1200000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I would like to make a counteroffer at $900000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $1100000. This is the highest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair compromise.
I appreciate your efforts to meet in the middle, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $1000000.

I understand you're getting close to your target price, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1000000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, and I'm offering the product to you for $1050000. This is the last offer I'm willing to make, and I hope you'll consider it.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $1000000.

I'm surprised you're still at $1000000, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm not going any lower. I'm offering the product to you for $1025000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll reconsider.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I respect your position and am willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. I would like to counteroffer at $1012500.
